instructions: Open the TikTok app on your iOS or Android smartphone or tablet and tap Me from the lower menu. Tap Edit profile . Tap your current name next to Name . Type your new name in the field. Tap Save .

Open TikTok on your phone or tablet. Tap Me from the menu across the bottom of the screen to go to your profile. Tap Edit profile . Tap the present username to the right of Username . Enter your new TikTok username and tap Save .

On your Android or iOS device, open the TikTok app. Tap Me . Tap Edit profile . Tap Change photo . Tap Take a photo to take a photo with your smartphone or tablet s camera and import it directly into the app. You can also tap Select from Photos to upload one that you already have saved on your device. Once you ve take or chosen your photo, you can enlarge, shrink, or move your image by pinching it with two fingers. When you re ready, tap Save . Your new profile photo will now be live on your TikTok account.
